measurementsAddedDescription: We will tailor clothing to fit perfectly

titleOrderSuccess: Plum has received your order. So what’s next?
textOrderSuccess: Check n***@proton.me for the order confirmation letter. Once the order is ready, we will send you a tracking number. If you want to be in the know about all our new drops, why not give us a follow on Instagram?
textFailedOrder: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us at help@pluplum.co

name: Name
emptyCartDescription: Add an item as soon as possible, and we will deliver this beauty to you.
agree: By clicking checkout, you are agreeing with Privacy Policy & Terms
addMeasurementsDescription2: Adding measurements is not necessary, but it will help us to make your dress fit perfectly
